EntryName	ACTT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Actin-related protein T1 (ARP-T1)
GeneName	ACTRT1 ARPT1 HSD27
Length	376
Function	Negatively regulates the Hedgehog (SHH) signaling. Binds to the promoter of the SHH signaling mediator, GLI1, and inhibits its expression.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cytoplasm; Nucleus; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Acrosome
